scripts.serve: npm run buildenv-prod && serve -s build -l 3000 -c public/serve.json
scripts.deploy:bobabase: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_ENV=prod REACT_APP_CHAIN=bobaBase REACT_APP_L1_NATIVE_TOKEN_SYMBOL=DEV react-scripts build && aws s3 rm s3://gateway.bobabase.boba.network --recursive && aws s3 sync build s3://gateway.bobabase.boba.network && aws s3 cp s3://gateway.bobabase.boba.network/index.html s3://gateway.bobabase.boba.network/index.html --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0 --content-type text/html
scripts.deploy:bobaoperatestnet: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_ENV=prod REACT_APP_CHAIN=bobaOperaTestnet REACT_APP_L1_NATIVE_TOKEN_SYMBOL=FTM react-scripts build && aws s3 rm s3://gateway.testnet.bobaopera.boba.network --recursive && aws s3 sync build s3://gateway.testnet.bobaopera.boba.network && aws s3 cp s3://gateway.testnet.bobaopera.boba.network/index.html s3://gateway.testnet.bobaopera.boba.network/index.html --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0 --content-type text/html
scripts.deploy:avaxtestnet: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_ENV=prod REACT_APP_CHAIN=bobaFuji REACT_APP_L1_NATIVE_TOKEN_SYMBOL=AVAX react-scripts build && aws s3 rm s3://gateway.testnet.avax.boba.network --recursive && aws s3 sync build s3://gateway.testnet.avax.boba.network && aws s3 cp s3://gateway.testnet.avax.boba.network/index.html s3://gateway.testnet.avax.boba.network/index.html --metadata-directive REPLACE --cache-control max-age=0 --content-type text/html
